ISSUE.TITLE: /posts endpoint ignores context=edit parameter
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Assuming: - a custom post type of `my_custom_type` - several custom fields like `a_custom_field` and `b_custom_field` The following endpoint doesn't include the custom fields in the meta data: ``` /posts?type=my_custom_type&context=edit ``` Unless I'm misunderstanding the docs, the `/posts` endpoint should include custom meta data. The custom fields meta data **is** included when I try the following: ``` /posts/19?context=edit ```
